relation: Sally and Henry's Doghouse Bar & Grill
4-8pm: $5 craft beer flights, organic house wines, local Mary's wings, seared tuna with oroshi ponzu, vegan brussels sprouts, local San Diego Pretzel Co. large soft pretzel.
5-8pm: $3 wells, select wine, and beer. $5 food specials.
2-6pm: $4 casa margarita well drinks, sangria, house wine, house shots, bottled and draft beers. $4 select appetizers and quesadillas.

4-7pm: $3 draft special and $2 off other 23 rotating taps, $5 house wine and specialty drinks. $3 organic beef or cheese pastel, $5 pub fries, linguica and farmer's market flatbreads, malagueta hot wings. 7pm-close: 20% off all food.
4-6:30pm: $3 select beers, $4 select wines. Half off appetizers.
3-6pm: Daily drink specials. $3 off burger and beer.

5-7pm: 2-for-1 wells, $5 22oz Japanese beer, $4 large hot sake, $3 sake bomb. $2 edamame, $3 garlic edamame, $4 Japanese fries, $5 chicken karage, $6 bangin' poppers, $5 spicy tuna roll, shrimp tempura roll, $6 California roll with real crab, $8 Sin City roll, $8 Alaskan roll.

4pm-close: $3 bottled beer, $4 house wine & wells, $5 Stella drafts, $6 Svedka martinis, classic vodka and dry martinis, drops, cosmos. $3 fries, $5 man candy, $5 sweet pea taquitos, $6 three-cheese mac, $6 chipotle meatball sliders, $7 crab cakes.
3-6pm and 10pm-midnight: $3 beer and tequila, $4 wines, well drinks, and margaritas. Discounted food.
3-7pm: $4 house wine and well cocktails, $5 drafts and Tullamore Dew.
3-7 pm: $4 shots, beer, and food specials.
5-6:30pm: $4 draft beers and select $5 cocktails. Chicken Liver & Apple Jack Whiskey Porcini Mushroom Pâté $4, Chipotle Charred Tomato Pork Ribs $5.

textAfterTable: Hexagone 3:30-7pm: All items $6, including onion soup, steamed clams, moules marinières, frog legs provençales, Rosette de Lyon (cold-cuts plate); cheese plate, snails (“escargots Bourguignons”), baked brie and apple, fried artichokes; half-size, half-price select mains. Bay Park Place Special Bay Park Fish Company 3-6pm: $1 off draft beer, $5 house wine. $2 oyster shooter, $3 fish taco, $6 basic sushi rolls, $8 ceviche, $9 steamed clams or mussels, $11 crab cakes. Bar and patio only. The High Dive 3-6pm: $2 off local drafts, $4 house drinks. IsaBella Artisan Pizzeria & Craft Beer Garden 4-close: Buy a pitcher or bottle of wine and get a free cheese pizza. Also: $6 appetizers. Offshore 3pm-close: $2.75 domestics, $3.75 sangria, wells, house wine, $4.25 imports, $6 Millionaire Mojitos. Discounted appetizers. 9pm-close: $3 Fireball/Espolon/Jager, and domestic bottles. Tio Leo's 3-7pm: $3 domestic pints, $4 import pints, $5 house margaritas and well drinks. $5 street tacos, TJ hot dogs, carne asada fries. Bonita Place Special Sapphire 18+ Lounge & Hookah 3-7pm: $2.50 domestic drafts, $1 off import drafts,
